```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```
```{r}
toolik_biochem <- read_csv(here::here("data", "2011_Kling_Akchem.csv"), na = c(".", NA)) %>% 
  clean_names()
```
```{r}
inet_biochem <- toolik_biochem %>% 
  subset(site == "Toolik Inlet") %>% 
  select(p_h, doc_u_m, tdn_u_m)
```

```{r}
# Summarize function and across for finding means for each column 

inet_biochem %>% 
  #group_by(p_h, doc_u_m, tdn_u_m) %>% 
  summarise(across(c("p_h", "doc_u_m", "tdn_u_m"), ~ mean(.x, na.rm = TRUE)))
```
```{r}
# Apply function for finding means per column 
apply(inet_biochem, 2, mean, na.rm = TRUE)

```
```{r}
# For loop for finding means per column 
mean_value_vector <- vector(mode = "numeric", length = ncol(inet_biochem))

for(i in 1:ncol(inet_biochem)) {
  mean_value <- mean(inet_biochem[[i]], na.rm = TRUE)
  mean_value_vector[i] <- mean_value
}
mean_value_vector
```
